notes.title: Availability of data and materials
notes.p: The original transcriptome sequencing data related to this article is stored in the NCBI SRA database with the Submission ID SUB8446872 ( https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/subs/bioproject/) and the BioProject ID PRJNA673655( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/PRJNA673655), Reviewer link: https://dataview.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/object/PRJNA673655?reviewer=5lfjtb644f2dg76db7tat7pvvh . Other data from the results of this article are also included in this article and its attached files.
